meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Arenaria, typically found in sandy areas.
meanings.sent1: The sandwort near the beach looked beautiful in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a delicate sandwort growing in the sand dunes.
meanings.sent3: The sandwort seemed to be dancing in the breeze, showing off its sandy home.
meanings.sent4: The sandwort stood out like a tiny oasis in the vast desert of sand.
meanings.sent5: As I walked along the shore, the sandwort added a touch of green to the sandy landscape.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Minuartia, also typically found in sandy areas.
meanings.sent1: The tiny sandwort plants were scattered across the sandy soil.
meanings.sent2: The botanist identified the sandwort species growing near the coast.
meanings.sent3: The sandwort plants whispered secrets to each other in the sandy garden.
meanings.sent4: Among the grains of sand, the sandwort stood tall like a miniature forest.
meanings.sent5: The sandwort blooms added a splash of color to the sandy beach.
